div.p: If field is a list, how to manage the list
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/map-list-mode defines the following codes:

tr.td: when the target list is being assembled, the items for this rule go first. If more that one rule defines a first item (for a given instance of mapping) then this is an error
the target instance is shared with the target instances generated by another rule (up to the first common n items, then create new ones)
when the target list is being assembled, the items for this rule go last. If more that one rule defines a last item (for a given instance of mapping) then this is an error

description.value: If field is a list, how to manage the list

definition.value: when the target list is being assembled, the items for this rule go first. If more that one rule defines a first item (for a given instance of mapping) then this is an error
the target instance is shared with the target instances generated by another rule (up to the first common n items, then create new ones)
when the target list is being assembled, the items for this rule go last. If more that one rule defines a last item (for a given instance of mapping) then this is an error
